COSMODROME

Concept : Cosmodrome is a Space Trade Tower Defence game

 INFO: This "space station simulation" allows you to manage a space station and trade with different ships that come to sell their products or stockpile supplies for their trip creating an adventure through a random interaction with the futuristic space environment. A cosmodrome or spaceport is a site for launching (or receiving) spacecraft.

Game Schematics:

-15 space backgrounds -1 spacetation  - 22 song in the OST -more than 75 sci-fi sounds -Manage a space station and its crew. -6 mercenarys ships to here -12 Slots to instal towers in toy station -10 towers to build -3 modules slots to instal -5 modules to build -6 officers structore to fill -7 randomizer officer creation every ingame 7 days -16 diferent factions to trade -45 diferent special trades with the factions -1 level (more coming soon on desktop version) -12 asteorids waves -constan space pirates atacks -military inpections for narcotics and weapons -more than 20 diferent ships and more to come
